skills.skill: Assisting with Activities of Daily Living

duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect, report and record patient data.
Assist patients with activities of daily living.
Implement selected aspects of the patient care plan according to hospital policy and procedure.
Assist in maintaining a safe and therapeutic environment for the patient and/or their family members.
Maintain unit equipment and supplies as directed.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED preferred. Nursing Students are encouraged to apply. 2 years of Nursing Technician/Assistant experience required or CNA or clinical experience in school.
